I believe this was fixed in v1.1 of the current ProxyControl (when it moved to
the org.eclipse.ui.internal.presentations.newapi package).

There is now a dispose listener that detaches from the target control if it gets
disposed before the proxy, so the proxy should never attempt to compute the size
of a disposed target control.
